## Protocol.Page.LayoutViewport interface

Layout viewport position and dimensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LayoutViewport 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clientHeight](./puppeteer.protocol.page.layoutviewport.clientheight.md) | [integer](./puppeteer.protocol.integer.md) | Height (CSS pixels), excludes scrollbar if present. |
|  [clientWidth](./puppeteer.protocol.page.layoutviewport.clientwidth.md) | [integer](./puppeteer.protocol.integer.md) | Width (CSS pixels), excludes scrollbar if present. |
|  [pageX](./puppeteer.protocol.page.layoutviewport.pagex.md) | [integer](./puppeteer.protocol.integer.md) | Horizontal offset relative to the document (CSS pixels). |
|  [pageY](./puppeteer.protocol.page.layoutviewport.pagey.md) | [integer](./puppeteer.protocol.integer.md) | Vertical offset relative to the document (CSS pixels). |
